oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Hooks Gets Nomination for FCC Post"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: African Americans; civil rights; Federal Communications Commission; Hooks, Benjamin L.; Nixon, Richard M.; 1970s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "Ben L. Hooks, Memphis attorney, today was nominated by President Nixon to become the first black to serve on a U.S. regulatory commission."
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Stillwell, Lee
